description: This file defines mock classes for unit testing the IDeviceDiagnostics interface and its notification component in C++. It employs Google Mock to create mock methods for various diagnostics functions related to device diagnostics, milestones, configuration, and AV decoder status.

classes.name: DeviceDiagnosticsMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IDeviceDiagnostics interface for unit testing diagnostics-related functionalities.

classes.name: DeviceDiagnosticsNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IDeviceDiagnostics::INotification interface for testing notification callbacks.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification with the diagnostics interface.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification.

methods.name: GetConfiguration
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of device configuration parameters.

methods.name: GetAVDecoderStatus
methods.description: Mocks fetching the status of the AV decoder.

methods.name: QueryInterface
methods.description: Mocks querying for a certain interface.

methods.name: OnAVDecoderStatusChanged
methods.description: Mocks the callback invoked when the AV decoder status changes.
